title: 25 more rp for a skin :(
body:
Would riot give me that 25 rp? I wanna have Captain Volibear and I have only 725 rp, it costs 750 rp.. 
Someone told me that I should draw something about LOL, so I did it...
https://gyazo.com/28b067e1c0d6c7fe9d0e2039f825d9d8

replies.body: We should be able to help out with that!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us and we'll see what we can do!
LOL...pls dont bring better nerf irelia anymore lol im tired of hearing it back then lol
